item.title: Taking Control of Your Passwords with Bitwarden
item.description: Having to deal with many passwords is a fact of life. A password manager like Bitwarden can ease the burden of inventing and remembering passwords. This step-by-step tutorial explains how to setup Bitwarden with its browser extension for Chrome.
